name: Pumped Mutt Rampage
description:
A 2D Beat´em up!! Playable on Mobile Devices, Desktop PC & MAC  ( + Gamepad ) What´s going on the streets... "Ruining that rigged fight, made the things went wrong and pissed all gang bosses off.  Lose, never was an option, so face off anybody looking for a fight. Don't waste your time and go your own way. Break out the city it wont be easy"... Are you tough enough ? "Download Here in Complete Version":       • Random Enemies       • 6 Levels • Also available in full:

KEYBOARD CONTROLS: Use arrows to move in the menus and intro to ok. CHARACTER MOVES: A: LEFT - S: DOWN -  D: RIGHT - W: UP J: PUNCHS - K: PUNCHS2 / DASHPUNCH + D or A L: BLOCKING / DASHROLL  + D or A SPACE: JUMP + J or K (KICK) P: PAUSE  - M: MUTTE  SUPR: EXIT TO TOP MENU
